alert.note: Alert for Garden; Grant; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with strong gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Cherry, northwestern Grant, northern Garden and southern Sheridan Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 129 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with strong gusty winds extending from 11 miles southeast of Hay Springs to near Alliance Airport. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Big Hill, Dipping Vat Meadow, Billys Lake, Deer Lake, Britton Lake, Miles Lake, Mumper, Wickson Lake, Diamond Lake, Herman Lake, Adams Flats, Krause Lake, Watson Lake, Rackett, Patterson Lake, Finnegan Lake and Kincaid Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 40. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building.
